name: LaceMail - A simple POP3 webmail client.
short_description: This is a simple, Mason/Perl based, webmail client specifically aimed at using a single POP3 back-end. Initially it will use MySQL to provide preferences, alternate sender addresses and signatures, along with virtual folders to separate emails.
